game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden within the lost city.
game.description: A legendary city, hidden deep within the mystical forest, holds a powerful artifact that could change the course of history. Retrieve it and return to the village elder.
game.reward: 1000 gold pieces, a magical amulet granting resistance to darkness

tasks.objective: Explore the mystical forest and locate the hidden entrance of Eldarath.
tasks.description: Venture into the heart of the mystical forest. The ancient trees hold secrets of their own, but beware for rumors tell of dark creatures that lurk in the shadows.

tasks.objective: Retrieve the ancient scroll from within the library of the lost city.
tasks.description: Navigate through the ruins and find the library. The ancient scroll contains crucial information about the artifact's whereabouts, but the path is fraught with traps.

tasks.objective: Find the artifact in the central chamber of Eldarath.
tasks.description: Using the knowledge from the scroll, make your way to the central chamber. The artifact is said to be guarded by a powerful entity. Are you prepared to face it?
